title: What is the best home cleaning products? - Quora

response.answer_text: I use Mr. Clean Magic Eraser for the stove and refrigerator, if there’s any spots on them. Then to polish them, and faucets, and the curtain rod, I use Wieman for Chrome. Lysol wipes for the bathroom and kitchen trash can. For furniture I use Weiman furniture polish, the Weiman products are great, and make the furniture shine. For floors I use the Swifter mop, it’s great, especially if you have a bad back, it fits in the smallest places.
Bathroom and Kitchen cleaner,Steam mops, Sponge mops,Magic Eraser,Tile Cleaner,Stove top cleaner,Disinfectent,and Wood Floor PollishYou could hire a professional house cleaner!
